statements: SELECT * FROM user_content;
SELECT id, user_id, content FROM user_content WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM user_content WHERE content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM user_content ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT content, user_id FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content, created_at FROM user_content WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, content FROM user_content WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS content_count FROM user_content GROUP BY user_id HAVING content_count > 2;
SELECT content FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 2 OR user_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM user_content;
SELECT content FROM user_content WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, content FROM user_content WHERE content LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, content FROM user_content JOIN comments ON user_content.user_id = comments.user_id WHERE comments.content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, content FROM user_content WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc' ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT content FROM user_content WHERE content LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, content, comment_id FROM user_content JOIN comments ON user_content.user_id = comments.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, content FROM user_content WHERE user_id != '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content, timestamp FROM UserPosts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, comment_text FROM UserProfiles INNER JOIN Comments ON UserProfiles.user_id = Comments.user_id;
SELECT post_id, content, username FROM UserPosts JOIN UserProfiles ON UserPosts.user_id = UserProfiles.user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, content, timestamp FROM UserPosts WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, bio FROM UserProfiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM UserPosts JOIN Comments ON UserPosts.post_id = Comments.post_id WHERE UserPosts.user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, c.comment_text FROM users u JOIN comments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.post_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, timestamp FROM Posts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT comment_text FROM Comments WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, follower_user_id FROM Followers WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY follower_id;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, timestamp FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT comment_text, timestamp FROM Comments ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_likes FROM Likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT user_id AS follower_user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_followers FROM Followers GROUP BY user_id;
